text: Novosevastopolskoye () is a rural locality (a selo) in Beloselskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 834 as of 2018. There are 15 streets. == Geography == The village is located 4 km to the north-east from Beloye, between Belaya and Laba. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Novosevastopolskoye
